short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspiring quotes from female philosophers, writers, scientists, and scholars

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Female Thinkers Quotes is a Chrome extension that provides users with inspiring quotes from female philosophers, writers, scientists, and scholars based on their chosen themes. Users can connect their own ChatGPT API to retrieve personalized and relevant quotes, offering a seamless and insightful experience.

 Features:
Connect to ChatGPT via your personal API key for enhanced functionality.
Input any theme or keyword (e.g., "freedom," "creativity," "courage").
Instantly receive relevant quotes from remarkable female thinkers with sources included.

How It Works:
After installing the extension, click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Enter your ChatGPT API key to establish a connection.
Type a theme or keyword in the input box.
Get a curated quote from influential female thinkers, generated through GPT retrieval.
